This is Manglemore's book, also known as the Book of Lies. Welcome to my playground!

You aren't the first to read these words, but so many who came before were just too fragile. They didn't last. So let me give you a hint:

If I shout "I will kill you all!" then if you're inside the orange circle, you're pretty much dead.

Unless I'm lying, of course, in which case the only safe place to be is inside the orange circle!

I leave it up to you to figure out whether or not I'm lying!
